localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
blogPost.body: The internet isn't one size fits all, your mobile browser shouldn't be either. With Insight, create extensions easily and quickly on your phone, and we suggest the most useful ones as you browse. Search only sources you trust; block ads, trackers and junk.
blogPost.title: Insight Browser - Supercharge search & browsing on iOS with no-code extensions
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 互联网不是万能的，您的手机浏览器也不应该是万能的。有了Insight，您可以在手机上轻松快速地创建扩展程序，我们会在您浏览时推荐最有用的扩展程序。只搜索您信任的来源；阻止广告、跟踪器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系统上使用无代码扩展进行超级搜索和浏览

localize.description: 互聯網不是萬能的，您的手機瀏覽器也不應該是萬能的。有了Insight，您可以在手機上輕鬆快速地創建擴展程序，我們會在您瀏覽時推薦最有用的擴展程序。只搜索您信任的來源；阻止廣告、跟蹤器和垃圾。
localize.tagline: 在iOS系統上使用無代碼擴展進行超級搜索和瀏覽

previous.excerpt: Collect your avatar from different parts. The code of this program is very easy, any developer will be able to understand the code. SVG is used to draw an avatar. Demo version of the project: https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
previous.title: Avatar Maker - Create your own avatar

localize.description: 从不同的地方收集你的头像。本程序的代码非常简单，任何开发人员都能理解。SVG是用来绘制头像的。项目演示版：https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
從不同的地方收集你的頭像。本程序的代碼非常簡單，任何開發人員都能理解。SVG是用來繪製頭像的。項目演示版：https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/

next.excerpt: Here's a well curated list of 168 tech and industry providers for Shopify merchants, from all major categories, including SMS Marketing, Customer Service, Analytics, Financial tools, and much, much more. Steal the JPG here or click link for HQ PDF version.
next.title: Shopify Technology Landscape - Curated List of over 150 Tools to Grow Your Store

localize.description: 这是一份精心策划的168家Shopify商家的技术和行业供应商名单，来自所有主要类别，包括短信营销、客户服务、分析、金融工具，还有很多很多。在这里偷拍JPG，或者点击链接查看总部PDF版本。
localize.tagline: 超过150个工具的精选列表，以发展你的商店。

localize.description: 這是一份精心策劃的168家Shopify商家的技術和行業供應商名單，來自所有主要類別，包括短信營銷、客戶服務、分析、金融工具，還有很多很多。在這裏偷拍JPG，或者點擊鏈接查看總部PDF版本。
localize.tagline: 超過150個工具的精選列表，以發展你的商店。
